# isAdjustingWhiteBalance

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the device is currently adjusting the white balance.

## Declaration

```swift
var isAdjustingWhiteBalance: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is key-value observable.
